precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible with no other windows open.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The context menu with the title bar is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will update to show the screen saver settings. A "Power..." button will appear below the "Monitor power" text.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow on the right side of the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screen saver options will appear, including "None," "3D FlowerBox," "3D Flying Objects," "3D Pipes," "3D Text," "Beziers," "Blank," "Marquee," "My Pictures Slideshow," "Mystify," and "Starfield." The previously selected "Windows XP" option will remain visible at the top and bottom of the list.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu and select "None".
expected_results: The "Settings" button below the "Screen saver" dropdown menu will become disabled.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Monitor power" section is visible, containing a button labeled "Power...".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, displaying tabs for "Power Schemes," "Advanced," "Hibernate," and "UPS".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section is visible.
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off monitor:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time interval options. The currently selected option will be highlighted.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" item in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will close and "Never" will be displayed as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close and the changes to the power settings will be applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Display Properties" window.
